section.heading: Distribution of income between RLA Revitalization Corporation and the District.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 201(a)(3) of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).
